_aChangeLog.text: Map changed from daytime to dawn/dusk

_sText:
zm_lego_miniworld_v4r is a lego-themed map. 

Since the old version of the map isn't that good, i decided to make the 4th version of the map. This version of the map provides improvement of the 3rd version of the map.

 It has 64 player spawns, some spots to barricade, or to hold. 

Things that have been modified:
  1. Some barricading and holding spots have been modified.
  2. The map has been extended, and more barricading / holding spots.
  3. Added boost on the 2nd area.
  4. The middle building.
  5. The 3D skybox.

The 1st version of the map thread:
plaguefest.com/threads/zm_lego_miniworld.19876

The 2nd version of the map thread:
plaguefest.com/threads/zm_lego_miniworld_v2.19904

The 3nd version of the map thread:
plaguefest.com/threads/zm_lego_miniworld_v3.19912

If there are bugs in the map, please notify me and i'll try to fix it.
